channel.title: Bloggings on The Art of Not Asking Why
channel.description: Recent content in Bloggings on The Art of Not Asking Why

item.title: Switching to Hugo - Full Time
item.description: PayPal informed me that the host of my WordPress blog is charging me for another $80 or so for the next year. The very next day, tumblr decided to shoot itself in the head (rather than the leg, if you ask me). It was good to be reminded to not trust cloud services for creative content - like my blog.

item.title: Hugo - what takes so long?
item.description: If you’ve bseen following me online for the last month or so (especially on reddit) you’d know I’ve been engaged in shifting away from WordPress and into the world Hugo.
